channel.title: Eazyscape 317 || Daily Updates || Decent Developers
channel.description:
[center][size=24pt]Eazyscape[/size] [url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/jv5oee4etv3tckd/Eazyscape.jar]Dowlnload[/url] | Forums | Webclient [size=12pt]Server Uptimes: Server Timezone: GMT +0.00 Monday - Friday 12pm - 12am Saturday - Sunday 12pm - Upto 4am These Times Aint Exact Some days it may start Later Or Finish Later. (p.s. Should Have A Vps Soon Anyways :D.)[/size] Currently There Is Only A Dl Link Until I Make A Website And Also This Server Is Still In Development. Server Content:
- 100% godswords - 100% flowergame - Npc clipping - Dice - Lots Of Training Areas - Plenty Minigames - No Combat Lag - No Rollbacks - Good Skilling - Good Pking - Good Switching
Media: [img]http://s11.postimg.org/6van7rzgz/home.png[/img] [img]http://s24.postimg.org/gobt8fg9h/Shops.png[/img] [img]http://s8.postimg.org/mq3i9ew51/Monster_Teles.png[/img] [img]http://s8.postimg.org/3z1kz91kl/npc_Clipping.png[/img] [img]http://s21.postimg.org/enb5t4mt3/ogres.png[/img] [img]http://s18.postimg.org/4tltw6jvt/Tzhaar_Caves.png[/img] [img]http://s21.postimg.org/70y748pyv/dice.png[/img] [img]http://s17.postimg.org/yw7vb5m67/Flowergame.png[/img] [img]http://s21.postimg.org/t2t2s0zuf/delta.png[/img] [/center]

item.title: Eazyscape 317 || Daily Updates || Decent Developers
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“dawsonsmokes, post:15, topic:524340”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=642883.msg4331112#msg4331112 date=1373660687]

You are a moderator not an administrator. Just saying I hate when mods think they can apply rules that an administrator is control of. It’s not in the rules and possibly did you think he forgot to post something yes he can modify it but then if someone already read it they don’t read it again cause the edit will not be in the new replies to your posts or unread posts

I’m pretty sure a moderator created the rules topic for this section.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


[/quote]Yeah but also those rules weren’t in there before you just put them in « Last Edit: Today at 02:28:16 PM by Jc22493 » Report to moderator Logged My topic gets locked yet someone gets warned ? so abuse of powers much sad JC espically when it wasn’t even added n the rules. You had to add it after you locked it…[/quote]

dawsonsmokes:

Just throwing something out there not going to pm him. Just want to know his answer towards this. Some kid gets a warning and then oh this kids being a asshole I am going to lock his thread. Most of these websites now a days have a good few mods then the rest are shit and don’t have a clue of what they are doing. Not throwing any names out there but my god. I know a lot of people who refuse to use mopar because of people using it and because of staff.

dawsonsmokes:

Well lets discuss this in PM we need to get the community togetherhow it used to be years ago.

dawsonsmokes:

Yeah I have had 2-3 accounts. One I deleted my hotmail so I will never be able to reset the password for it lol

Please stop spamming everywhere. This is an advertisement thread. Thanks.

Read full topic
